subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chris Armas, the Chicago Fire captain, retired after a 12-year career in M.L.S., including the last 10 in Chicago. Armas, a 35-year-old midfielder, played in 264 regular-season games and had two goals in 66 appearances with the United States national team.
